subject: Re: JUnit html report
msgSnippet: Hi All; First of all thanks to everyone who has replied my question. @James Abley : We are using Cruise control and i had seen a test results link on the build
messageBody:
Hi All;

First of all thanks to everyone who has replied my question.

@James Abley : We are using Cruise control and i had seen a test results link on the build results page. But the building operation is under teh control of another team. So i jut want to test it locally on my local projects.

I think the best way is to use ant task. Is there more sample pages on the internet i can inspect. The reason of my question was : I am unfamiliar with ant. But I think it is the right time to learn it.

I have also said that we are using SOA architecture. So it makes unit testing harder for me. Because i was unable to get the coverage with emma. Years years ago an underlying architecture was build and we are still using it.

As an example: We have method like listBankElemnts() and is registred as BANK_LIST_ELEMENTS service.

So the underlying mechanism calls listBankElements method when ve call BANK_LIST_ELEMENTS with a refernce call mechanism. So emma can not cover listBankElemnts method. And this causes a very very low coverage. Is there a possibility that we can also not get the list of metods within our html report that were called by the SOA service names?

Yours.



�brahim DEM�R
